long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Have you ever watched a movie or series on a streaming platform and felt the sound was too quiet? ğŸ˜• Did you have to turn up the volume to the max and still weren't satisfied? ğŸ“‰ Enter Audio Booster - your solution to the problem of a quiet audio track in online media! ğŸš€

What is Audio Booster?
Audio Booster is an innovative extension for the Chrome browser ğŸŒ, allowing you to increase the maximum volume of audio played on popular streaming platforms. Easily adjust the volume using a slider ğŸšï¸ or predefined buttons in extensions pop-up menu to achieve the optimal sound level. ğŸ”Š

Features
ğŸ”¹ Volume Increase: Set the volume according to your needs.
ğŸ”¹ Predefined levels: Choose from ready-made volume settings for quick adjustment.
ğŸ”¹ Compatibility: Works with multiple SVOD platforms.

Supported Platforms ğŸ¥
The extension mainly focuses on Netflix but also works great with many more!

How to use? ğŸ› ï¸

Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Open a movie or series on one of the supported platforms. ğŸ¬
Click the extension icon in the browser bar. ğŸ–±ï¸
Use the slider or predefined buttons in extensions pop-up menu to increase the volume. ğŸ§

Version 0.0.8 (2024-11-25)

Implemented bug fixes for various issiues
Version 0.0.1 (2023-09-14)
Initial release
Support for Netflix
